title: U.S. Job Market Stalls Amid Economic Challenges: AI, Policy Shifts, and Wage Growth
description: The December employment report from the Labor Department revealed a noticeable slowdown in US job growth with significant losses impacting the construction retail and manufacturing sectors The unexpected decline has been attributed to aggressive trade policies and the cautious approach businesses adopt amid costly AI investments

title: Musk's AI bot Grok limits image generation on X to paid users after backlash
description: The chatbot's image generation had allowed users on X to edit ⁠or create sexualized photos

title: Realbotix Unveils David: Customizable Male AI Companion Robot at CES 2026
description: Realbotix unveiled David, a male AI companion robot, at CES 2026, shifting from female models to offer customizable, emotionally intelligent interactions via advanced AI and modular design. This innovation addresses diverse companionship needs, sparking ethical debates and market excitement. David's debut redefines human-robot relationships.
